docs.snippet: Investigators are baffled by the fatal shootings last week of a "quiet family" of four, including two young boys, at their suburban Houston home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Investigators are baffled by the fatal shootings last week of a "quiet family" of four, including two young boys, at their suburban Houston home.

headline.main: Sheriff Baffled by Killing of Houston-Area Family
headline.print_headline: Sheriff Baffled by Killing of Houston-Area Family

docs.snippet: A man accused in the 2012 killing of two University of Southern California graduate students from China, a crime that stunned the prestigious private school, pleaded guilty on Wednesday to murder charges and was sentenced to life in prison....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man accused in the 2012 killing of two University of Southern California graduate students from China, a crime that stunned the prestigious private school, pleaded guilty on Wednesday to murder charges and was sentenced to life in prison.

headline.main: Man Pleads Guilty to Murder of USC Students From China
headline.print_headline: Man Pleads Guilty to Murder of USC Students From China

docs.snippet: Idaho State Police say they didn't conduct an investigation following revelations that private prison company Corrections Corporation of America understaffed a prison and gave the state falsified documents to hide vacancies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Idaho State Police say they didn't conduct an investigation following revelations that private prison company Corrections Corporation of America understaffed a prison and gave the state falsified documents to hide vacancies.

headline.main: Idaho State Police: We Didn't Investigate CCA
headline.print_headline: Idaho State Police: We Didn't Investigate CCA
